name: Pyrite Pirates
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Yar, me maties!  Join us on an adventure across the high seas! With plunder comes risk, an' fo shore enemy pirates lookin' to steal yer booty. Let us sail from port to port an' revel in our riches.  Our greed be prosperous, an' nay weigh us down.

A game made in Unity, by your sea-loving pirates: SmallKiwi, Kattejuice, Jake Gamelin & Davido01.

CONTROLS (Keyboard & Mouse / Partial Controller Support):

Move - WASD / Left Thumbstick

Fire - Left Mouse Button  / A

Aim - Move Mouse
